body_html:
I figured out that this issue was caused by having a GOPATH that consists of multiple directories, for instance mine is: GOPATH=$HOME/gocode/extern:$HOME/gocode/jpad;

This confuses generate.sh in locating PROTOC and eventually PATH. I fixed the issue by setting GOPATH to the top level directory that contains the source of TensorFlow, in my case GOPATH=$HOME/gocode/extern

I'm not a .sh script expert enough to fix generate.sh to make it handle A GOPATH with multiple top level entries.
